thread.title: The Rev. Dr. Doug Eddy
thread.title_full: Colorado Pen reviewed by The Rev. Dr. Doug Eddy

author: The Rev. Dr. Doug Eddy
title: The Rev. Dr. Doug Eddy
text: I have purchased a number of pens and other items from Colorado Pen and find their prices appropriately competitive and there support excellent. In a couple of cases there were minor glitches and they corrected them immediately, going out of their way to do so. I highly recommend them.
